meanings.definition: Stylish or fashionable in a sophisticated way.
meanings.sent1: She always looks chicer than anyone else at the party.
meanings.sent2: The new dress she bought is chicer than her old one.
meanings.sent3: Her cat tried to look chicer by wearing a tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: The chicer decor of the restaurant made it feel like a fancy castle.
meanings.sent5: The chicer outfits in the magazine inspired her to update her wardrobe.

meanings.definition: More stylish or fashionable than something else.
meanings.sent1: The chicer car in the showroom caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her hairstyle is chicer than it was last year.
meanings.sent3: The chicer shoes made him feel like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: The chicer handbag she bought was a symbol of her success.
meanings.sent5: The chicer sunglasses shielded her eyes from the bright sun.
